special_powers.name: OXYGEN FILTRATION MASK
special_powers.description: Star-Lord ignores damage dealt by Poison.

special_powers.name: ESPIONAGE BATTLE SUIT
special_powers.description: Star-Lord can use Stealth and Running Shot.

special_powers.name: SHORT-DURATION FLIGHT
special_powers.description: Star-Lord can use Leap/Climb. When he does, if he moved half his speed value or less, after actions resolve, he may make a ranged combat attack as a free action.

special_powers.name: SIBLING RIVALRY
special_powers.description: When Gamora attacks an opposing character named Nebula, modify Gamora's attack and damage values by +1. Opposing characters named Nebula can't use Shape Change.

special_powers.name: WORKING BOTH SIDES
special_powers.description: When a hindered line of fire is drawn to Gamora, she modifies her defense value by +2 instead of +1.

special_powers.name: SHARE THROUGH THE WORLDMIND
special_powers.description: Friendly characters with the Nova Corps keyword and occupying hindering terrain modify their attack and range values by +1 unless already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: SHARE THROUGH THE WORLDMIND
special_powers.description: Friendly characters with the Nova Corps keyword can use Improved Targeting: Friendly Characters

special_powers.name: PULL BACK!
special_powers.description: Nova Corps Officer and adjacent friendly characters not on their first click and of a lower point value can use Improved Movement: Hindering.

special_powers.name: TACTICAL GENIUS
special_powers.description: Rocket Raccoon can use Perplex, but only to modify attack and defense values. When he uses Perplex, he can target both a friendly and an opposing character and modify the same combat value for each.

special_powers.name: CROWD CONTROL
special_powers.description: Rocket Raccoon can use Energy Explosion and Precision Strike.

special_powers.name: EVASIVE
special_powers.description: When Rocket Raccoon is targeted with an attack, roll a d6 and subtract 3 (minimum 1). Increase his defense value by the result.

special_powers.name: UPON MY DEATH: DESTRUCTION
special_powers.description: When Sakaaran Soldier is KO'd, before removing him from the map and even if he is adjacent to an opposing character, make a ranged combat attack with a locked attack value of 9 that can't be rerolled. The area of effect for this attack is all opposing characters within 4 squares and each hit character is dealt 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: MINION: FOR THE BROTHERHOOD
special_powers.description: When a friendly character named Sakaaran Commander is within 5 squares, Sakaaran Soldier can use Running Shot.

special_powers.name: LEAD FROM DARKNESS
special_powers.description: Sakaaran Commander can use Leadership and Stealth. When using Leadership, Sakaaran Commander may only remove action tokens from characters with which he shares a keyword.

special_powers.name: FOG OF WAR
special_powers.description: Sakaaran Commander can use Force Blast and Smoke Cloud.

special_powers.name: LIVE KREE OR DIE!
special_powers.description: Other friendly characters within 4 squares and with the Kree keyword increase their attack and defense values by +1 unless already modified by this effect.

special_powers.name: YOU STAND ACCUSED!
special_powers.description: During the beginning of the game, choose an opposing character with a point value of 100 or greater. When that character is within Ronan the Accuser's line of fire, standard defense powers it possesses are countered.

special_powers.name: COSMI-ROD
special_powers.description: Ronan the Accuser can use Force Blast, Penetrating/Psychic Blast, and Quake.

special_powers.name: I... AM...
special_powers.description: When turning the dial, if this click is revealed due to damage taken from an opponent's attack, stop turning the dial. Groot has Tiny Symbol, can't be targeted by ranged combat attacks, and is considered smaller than all other characters. If Groot occupies water terrain or your starting area, you may give him a double power action and heal him of 3 damage. This power can't be ignored.

special_powers.name: VERY INTELLIGENT PLANT LIFE
special_powers.description: Groot can use Outwit and Plasticity. Opposing characters within 2 squares and line of fire must roll to break away from Groot.

special_powers.name: SIBLING RIVALRY
special_powers.description: When Nebula attacks a character named Gamora, Nebula modifies her attack and damage values by +1. Opposing characters named Gamora can't use Combat Reflexes.

special_powers.name: ORGANIZATIONAL CONTROL
special_powers.description: If Irani Rael is in your starting area and not adjacent to an opposing character, she can draw lines of fire and count range and squares from the square of any one friendly character with the Nova Corps Keyword.

special_powers.name: SHARE THROUGH THE WORLDMIND
special_powers.description: Friendly characters with the Nova Corps keyword ignore knock back and modify their defense values by +1.

special_powers.name: HIGHER GROUND
special_powers.description: Yondu can use Energy Shield/Deflection.

special_powers.name: ONE. LITTLE. WHISTLE.
special_powers.description: When making a ranged combat attack against a single target, modify Yondu's attack by +2.

special_powers.name: SIMPLE MAN, SIMPLE PURPOSE
special_powers.description: During the beginning of the game, choose an opposing character. Modify Drax the Destroyer's attack value by +1 when targeting that character with a close combat attack.

special_powers.name: I AM THE DESTROYER
special_powers.description: Drax the Destroyer can use Charge and Precision Strike.

special_powers.name: THERE WAS NOBODY IN IT I WANTED TO SEE
special_powers.description: When this click is revealed while taking damage from an attack, roll a d6 and on a result of 5-6, stop turning the dial. Drax the Destroyer can use Regeneration and, if he has one or more action tokens, he can use it as a free action.

special_powers.name: MACHINE-LIKE PRECISION
special_powers.description: Drax the Destroyer can use Close Combat Expert and Combat Reflexes.

special_powers.name: PASSING THE TORCH
special_powers.description: When Rhomann Dey is KO'd, choose a friendly character for the rest of the game, that character can use Toughness, has a minimum range value of 6, and has the Nova Corps keyword.

special_powers.name: PURSUER TEMPLATES
special_powers.description: During the beginning of the game, choose an opposing character. If that character moved and made an attack since your last turn, give Korath the Pursuer a free action and place him in a square adjacent to that character.

special_powers.name: AUGMENTED CYBERNETICS
special_powers.description: Give Korath the Pursuer a power action and place an adjacent standard object on his card. Modify Korath the Pursuer's attack and defense value by +1 for each of these objects on his card. When this power is lost, any objects on his card are removed from the game. This power can't be countered or ignored.

special_powers.name: SUBDUE THE TARGET
special_powers.description: Korath the Pursuer can use Energy Explosion, Force Blast and Incapacitate.

special_powers.name: I MUST POSSESS IT
special_powers.description: During the beginning of the game, after characters have been placed, 1 Collectible token per 100 points of the game's build total will be placed on the map. Each Collectible must be at least 3 squares away from each other and any starting area. An opponent places half of the Collectibles and you place the remainder. When a character occupies a square with a Collectible, give it a power action, roll a d6, and on a result of 4-6, place the Collectible on its card. If that character is KO'd, return each Collectible into a distinct adjacent square. When all friendly Collectibles are on friendly characters' cards and those characters occupy your starting area, give the Collector a double power action and all opposing characters are KO'd.

special_powers.name: YOU ARE ONE OF A KIND
special_powers.description: When The Collector makes an attack targeting a character that is Unique or Prime, modify his attack by +1 for every 100 points or fraction thereof of the target's point value.

special_powers.name: SCREAM RIGHT BACK IN HIS FACE
special_powers.description: When Star-Lord is KO'd due to an opposing character's attack, deal that character 2 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: ALL-OUT
special_powers.description: Star-Lord can use Running Shot. Once per game when he does, modify his combat values by +2 until actions resolve and then deal him 1 unavoidable damage.

special_powers.name: BURST FIRE
special_powers.description: When you make a ranged combat attack that deals damage, you may choose to deal Star-Lord's printed damage value to hit targets instead of normal damage.

special_powers.name: HOW ABOUT "ROCKET RACCOON AND HIS HUMAN HANGERS-ON"?
special_powers.description: Friendly characters adjacent to Rocket Raccoon with the Guardians of the Galaxy or Ravagers keyword modify their attack values by +1.

special_powers.name: SMARTEST MAMMAL IN THE D'AST GALAXY
special_powers.description: Rocket Raccoon can use Enhancement and Outwit.

special_powers.name: HADRON ENFORCER
special_powers.description: Once per game, give Star-Lord a free action and choose an unoccupied square of clear terrain within range and line of fire. When you do, Star-Lord can use Pulse Wave this turn as if he occupied that square.

special_powers.name: INSIPRING COMMANDER
special_powers.description: Star-Lord can use Empower and Enhancement.

special_powers.name: LEADING THE ATTACK
special_powers.description: Friendly characters adjacent to Star-Lord that share a keyword with him can be given a non-free action even if they have 2 action tokens. When they do, deal that character 1 unavoidable damage after actions resolved and don't remove tokens from that character at the end of your turn even if this power is lost or ignored.

special_powers.name: TWO BIG GUNS
special_powers.description: Give Rocket Raccoon a power action and he may then make 2 ranged combat attacks as free actions.

special_powers.name: DEADLIEST WOMAN IN THE WHOLE GALAXY
special_powers.description: Give Gamora a free action and choose an opposing character. When Gamora attacks the chosen character, modify her attack and damage values by +1. Gamora can't choose again until the chosen character has been KO'd.

special_powers.name: ALWAYS GET MY TARGET
special_powers.description: Gamora can use Plasticity and Sidestep.

special_powers.name: NERVE STRIKE
special_powers.description: Gamora can use Close Combat Expert. When she does, if Gamora hits an opposing character, modify one of that character's combat values by -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: HADRON ENFORCER
special_powers.description: Once per game, Give Drax the Destroyer a free action and choose an unoccupied square of clear terrain within range and line of fire. When you do, Drax the Destroyer can use Pulse Wave this turn as if he occupied that square.

special_powers.name: PHOSPHORESCENT FLOWERS
special_powers.description: Lines of fire drawn to opposing characters within 6 squares of Groot ignore hindering terrain.

special_powers.name: WOODEN COCOON
special_powers.description: Groot can use Defend and Invulnerability. Adjacent friendly characters can use Toughness.

special_powers.name: I WILL NOT BE DENIED
special_powers.description: Ronan's powers can't be countered.

special_powers.name: ARMORED ROBE
special_powers.description: Ronan can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Impervious.

special_powers.name: RESERVES OF POWER
special_powers.description: During the beginning of your turn, Ronan can use Regeneration as a free action.
